name: Pentominos
description:
Classic pentomino game.  Can choose from several levels or try and make your own.  Zip file is compiled for windows.

Features:

- the 12 pentomino pieces on a 14 x 22 gameboard.

- create your own levels

Source code at https://github.com/LucasM127/Pentominos.   Developed on linux mint with SFML dependency.  Thanks for playing.

Press F to toggle fullscreen.
